4855.verse: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ|Denied|119|130|12122$قَبْلَهُمْ|before them|100|123|11274$قَوْمُ|(the) people|102|125|6840$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh,|80|103|4641$فَكَذَّبُواْ|and they denied|127|150|14306$عَبْدَنَا|Our slave|82|94|14787$وَقَالُواْ|and said,|80|165|760$مَجْنُونٌ|`A madman,`|109|278|15581$وَٱزْدُجِرَ|and he was repelled.|157|242|16342$

4857.verse: فَفَتَحْنَآ|So We opened|116|137|16345$أَبْوَٲبَ|(the) gates|96|138|5590$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|(of) heaven|98|140|157$بِمَآءٍ|with water|91|132|10732$مُّنْهَمِرٍ|pouring down|108|129|16346$

4858.verse: وَفَجَّرْنَا|And We caused to burst|181|190|10761$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|110|197$عُيُونًا|(with) springs,|116|134|16347$فَٱلْتَقَى|so met|78|96|16348$ٱلْمَآءُ|the water(s)|104|122|719$عَلَىٰٓ|for|63|72|52$أَمْرٍ|a matter|77|184|5045$قَدْ|already|68|282|1097$قُدِرَ|predestined.|102|209|16349$

4859.verse: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ|And We carried him|148|186|16350$عَلَىٰ|on|63|138|52$ذَاتِ أَلْوَٲحٍ|(ark) made of planks|156|231|16351$وَدُسُرٍ|and nails,|83|120|16352$

4861.verse: وَلَقَد|And certainly|107|142|640$تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ|We left it|92|161|16354$ءَايَةً|(as) a Sign,|98|167|2339$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|171|6409$مِن|any|50|84|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4863.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4868.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|120|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|169|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|110|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|151|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|117|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4870.verse: فَقَالُوٓاْ|And said,|81|95|4596$أَبَشَرًا|`Is (it) a human being|167|194|16366$مِّنَّا|among us|83|110|1169$وَٲحِدًا|one,|76|104|1223$نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ|(that) we should follow him?|208|222|16367$إِنَّآ|Indeed, we|94|120|120$إِذًا|then|50|102|1317$لَّفِى|(will be) surely in|133|186|1513$ضَلَـٰلٍ|error|77|130|3468$وَسُعُرٍ|and madness.|111|137|16368$

4872.verse: سَيَعْلَمُونَ|They will know|117|142|16371$غَدًا|tomorrow|82|131|8844$مَّنِ|who|50|99|1673$ٱلْكَذَّابُ|(is) the liar,|98|147|16372$ٱلْأَشِرُ|the insolent one.|132|156|16373$

4873.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|108|120$مُرْسِلُواْ|(are) sending|108|131|16374$ٱلنَّاقَةِ|the she-camel|115|138|16375$فِتْنَةً|(as) a trial|90|113|7216$لَّهُمْ|for them,|81|104|98$فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ|so watch them|119|131|16376$وَٱصْطَبِرْ|and be patient.|122|122|11256$

4853.verse: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

4854.verse: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

4855.verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

4856.verse: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

4857.verse: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

4858.verse: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

4859.verse: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

4860.verse: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

4861.verse: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

4862.verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

4863.verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

4864.verse: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

4865.verse: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

4866.verse: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

4867.verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

4868.verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

4870.verse: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

4871.verse: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

4872.verse: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

4873.verse: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
